content:
@Oliver Egger and @Simone Heckmann - you both have provided excellent input to MHD/MHDS. I think ITI needs to have a discussion on these, possibly creating a set of CP, corrections, revisions, etc. Not sure what would be decided to produce. But it seems these are important enough to start a discussion about fixing/clarifying them.
I created an ITI "new work item" to try to work on that plan - https://github.com/IHE/IT-Infrastructure/issues/175
can you nominate specific issues that would justify action?
